name: ROI decluster
description: Script to remove small clusters or standalone voxels from an ROI/atlas dataset

inputs.name: Input Dataset
inputs.description: Required input dataset. This dataset should be set of integer values. The program mostly assumes approximate isotropic voxels.

inputs.name: Output Directory
inputs.description: Directory name for output. All output goes to this directory.

inputs.name: Voxel Threshold
inputs.description: Number of voxels in a cluster to keep

inputs.name: Fraction Threshold
inputs.description: Fraction of voxels in a cluster to keep [0.0-1.0]

inputs.name: Output Prefix
inputs.description: Base name of final output dataset, i.e. baseprefix.nii.gz

inputs.name: Neighborhood Type
inputs.description: Neighborhood type using in finding mode: 1 - facing neighbors, 2 - edges, 3 - corners

author: AFNI Developers
